personal-assistant.journalFolderName.description: The path from the root of the vault that your journal entries live in.

personal-assistant.vaultPath.description: The path to the root of the vault your personal information lives in.

personal-assistant.journalTasksHeading.description: The heading for the tasks section in your journal.

languageModelTools.name: journal-tools_readJournalEntries
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Read journal entries from a markdown-based knowledge store.

journalPath.description: Name of the folder that contains the journal files, relative to vault root. Defaults to '1 Journal'.

maxEntries.description: Maximum number of journal entries to return. Optional.

includeContent.description: Whether to include the full content of each journal entry. Defaults to false.

languageModelTools.name: journal-tools_addJournalEntry
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Add an entry to the weekly journal file for a given date (defaults to today). If a matching day heading exists (e.g., '## 14 Thursday'), the entry is appended under it; otherwise it's appended to the end of the file.

entryContent.description: The content of the journal entry.

journalPath.description: Name of the folder that contains the journal files, relative to vault root. Defaults to '1 Journal'.

date.description: Target date in YYYY-MM-DD. Optional; defaults to today.

languageModelTools.name: journal-tools_addJournalTask
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Add a task or action item to the weekly journal under a configurable tasks heading (default: '## Tasks This Week') as a markdown checkbox. Useful for tracking action items from conversations.

journalPath.description: Name of the folder that contains the journal files, relative to vault root. Defaults to '1 Journal'.

date.description: Target date in YYYY-MM-DD to determine which week. Optional; defaults to today.

completed.description: Mark task as completed. Defaults to false (unchecked).

languageModelTools.name: date-utility-tools_calculateRelativeDate
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Calculate an exact date from a relative description (e.g., 'today', 'last Wednesday', 'next Monday', 'two weeks ago'). Returns the date and day of the week for verification.

relativeDateDescription.description: The relative date description (e.g., 'today', 'last Wednesday', 'next Friday', 'yesterday', 'two weeks ago').

referenceDate.description: Optional reference date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not provided, uses today's date.

languageModelTools.name: date-utility-tools_getDateInfo
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get information about a specific date including day of week, ISO week number, and relative position to today.

date.description: The date to get information about in YYYY-MM-DD format.

languageModelTools.name: date-utility-tools_getWeekDates
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all dates in the current week (or a specific week) with their day names. Useful for planning journal entries.

date.description: Optional date in YYYY-MM-DD format to get the week for. Defaults to current week.

languageModelTools.name: chat-tools-sample_runInTerminal
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run a command in a terminal and return the output

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
